  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eun</catalog>
            <entry>14581</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="de">Evropsko dr?avljanstvo</string>
            <string language="en">Evropsko državljanstvo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dr?avljanstvo d'Evropsko</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dr?avljanstvo de Evropsko</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dr?avljanstvo di Evropsko</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Dr?avljanstvo Evropsko</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dr?avljanstvo de Evropsko</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Dieses Lernobjekt behandelt die EU und die EU-Bürgerschaft im Hinblick auf EU-Symbole und -Länder.</string>
            <string language="en">This LO is about EU and its citizenship from the point of view of EU symbols and countries that consist it</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">EU-Symbole</string>
            <string language="en">EU symbols</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce BAS est au sujet d'EU et de sa citoyenneté du 
point de vue des symboles et des pays d'EU qui consistent il</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este BAIXO é sobre o EU e o seu citizenship do 
ponto da vista dos símbolos e dos países do EU que consistem ele</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo MINIMO è circa l'UE e la relativa 
cittadinanza dal punto di vista dei simboli e dei paesi di UE 
che sono costituiti esso</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το LO είναι για την ΕΕ και την υπηκοότητά του 
από την άποψη των συμβόλων και των χωρών της ΕΕ που αποτελούνται 
αυτό</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este BAJO está sobre el EU y su ciudadanía desde
el punto de vista de los símbolos y de los países del EU que 
consisten él</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Symboles d'EU</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Símbolos do EU</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Simboli di UE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύμβολα της ΕΕ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Símbolos del EU</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>web page</value>
          </learningResourceType>
          <intendedEndUserRole>

          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-t-lre">10-18</string>
            <string language="en">10-18</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Nachdem sich Studierende im Internet über die EU im Allgemeinen, über das EU-Parlament, die Menschen- und Bürgerrechte, die EU-Symbole und Geschichte informiert haben, können sie das dabei erworbene Wissen mit diesem Quiz überprüfen. Dies fördert das Verständnis für die Geschichte und die Bedeutung der EU-Symbole.</string>
            <string language="en">After surfing the net and studing about EU in general, about its parliament, human rights and citizenship, EU symbols and its history students can check their knowledge with the help of this quiz. It helps them understand the historical view of EU and the value of its symbols.</string>
          </description>
        </educational>
